Cycle_of_First_Fire.theme: Awakening of agency from inert existence.
stages: Ignition: Spark arises in the Void-Seed.
Fracture: Light divides into many wills.
Conquest of Night: First conflicts of identity.
Cycle_of_First_Fire.recurrences: Appears in volcanic cultures, war-gods, rebirth myths.

Cycle_of_Returning_Stars.theme: Patterns collapsing and restoring across epochs.
Cycle_of_Returning_Stars.recurrences: Used in navigational rites and funerary sky-prayers.
